qas.question: Why did Steele think people were not attacking Barrack Obama?

answers.text: Because he has no slave blood in him

qas.question: What does Condoleeza Rice prefer to term people as?
What did President Sarkozy think Secretary of State Rice was?
Who is Charles Kenzie Steele Jr?

answers.text: CEO of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference

qas.question: Why did Steele say what he did?
Who accused people of attacking Barack Obama more than Michelle Obama?
What year did Charles Kenzie Steele, Jr. accuse the media of attacking Barack Obama?
Who was mistaken for a "recent American immigrant" by the German Prime Minister?
What designation for African Americans does Condoleezza Rice prefer over "black" and "white"?
Who claimed that descendants of slaves had a good head start?

context: Reacting to media criticism of Michelle Obama during the <b6_0>2008<b6_0/> presidential election, <b5_0>Charles Kenzie Steele, Jr.<b5_0/>, <a3_0>CEO of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference<a3_0/> said, "Why are they attacking Michelle Obama, and not really attacking, to that degree, her husband? <a0_0>Because he has no slave blood in him<a0_0/>." He later claimed his comment was intended <a4_0>to be "provocative"<a4_0/> but declined to expand on the subject. Former Secretary of State <b7_0><b9_0>Condoleezza Rice<b9_0/><b7_0/> (who was famously mistaken for a "<a2_0>recent American immigrant<a2_0/>" by French President Nicolas Sarkozy), said "descendants of slaves did not get much of a head start, and I think you continue to see some of the effects of that." She has also rejected an <b8_0>immigrant<b8_0/> designation for African Americans and instead prefers the term <a1_0>"black" or "white"<a1_0/> .
